articles.title: Stanley Cup ratings jump 43% across North America, NHL says - ESPN
articles.description: Canada's participation in the Stanley Cup Final attracted plenty of interest as Game 1 between the Edmonton Oilers and Florida Panthers on Saturday night saw a 43% increase in television ratings across North America over last season, the NHL said Monday.
articles.content:
Jun 10, 2024, 04:48 PM ET
Canada's participation in the Stanley Cup Final attracted plenty of interest as Game 1 between the Edmonton Oilers and Florida Panthers on Saturday drew a 43% increase in r… [+784 chars]
